commit message: Do not display empty user names in Roster. Fixes #13
Save 'Hide/Show Offline' menu state to prefs. Fixes #11
fix race condition on creating / showing roster
rosterDB: purge old entries on connect; add offline and online entries
give better names to boolean params

implement offline message transmission

If the user is offline, outgoing messages are stored into the chats
database with read=false. On the next connection, they are transmitted
in a bunch.

user alias in chat window, per-JID notifications

Added support for notification for each JID in the roster instead of one
notification for all. Opening that JIDs chat only removes the correct
notification. Notifications also contain the correct message count per
JID.
display screen name in chat window
replace internal ok/cancel by android resources
default status message should be empty
Fixed bug where notification would vibrate only once and not for each message received
take care of XMPPConnection.connect() failing silently
catch all exceptions thrown by XMPPConnection
always force a disconnect before connecting
added account configuration option to specify a custom server hostname
Add layout tags to improve accessibility.
Make roster grab focus on connect.
Make roster request focus on activity creation.
Add layout tags to improve accessibility.
Make roster grab focus on connect.
Make roster request focus on activity creation.

Changed SDK-Version to 4 (Android 1.6) because the accesibility features
need it

need it
implement wake lock for connecting and message processing
fix up build.xml for proguard on 1.6
remove wakelock from smackableimp - it doesnt help fix #12
workaround for duplicate messages. should fix #12
display actual error cause on screen

ask the user for the SSL certificate

This feature requires the MemorizingTrustManager submodule, a patch to
smack and minor modifications to the SmackableImp.
replace c&p anonymous functors with new EditText preference

Merge 'pfleidi/master': add custom server support

This commit is not a straight merge. Instead, the verification of the
hostname has been removed and the dialog has been reworked slightly.
make custom host and port advanced
clean up c&p code in context menu
rework of strings.xml for proper translation support
store presence and away message in config, reset on startup
added german and partial french translation
workaround the duplicate messages bug. once again
try to fix FC with hidden groups
only add packet listener once, remove old duplicate detection, fix #12
do not scroll chat view down on tap
created GroupNameView for editing group names
you can't get a roster entry _after_ it's been deleted
add cancel to chat options menu
do not crash after orientation change
fix not receiving messages after reconnect
do not send 'online' status after the actual one. fixes #24
add support for enforcing SSL/TLS. fixes #22
reset the connection backend on every reconnect, in case the prefs changed
display an exception stack trace on failed connection
get the right asmack.jar, fixes AndroidDebugger issues
do not enable smack debugger by default
